00268 inline void
00269 PacketCache::deletePacket( timedCache_t::iterator start )
00270 {
00271       m_totalPacketSize -= (*start)->second->getPacketLength();
00272       delete (*start)->second;
00273       m_packetCache.erase( *start);
00274 }
00275 
00276 inline uint32
00277 PacketCacheValue::getLastUsedTime() const
00278 {
00279    return m_lastUsedTime;
00280 }
00281 
00282 inline uint32
00283 PacketCache::getCurrBufSize() const
00284 {
00285    return m_totalPacketSize;
00286 }
00287 
00288 inline uint32
00289 PacketCache::getTotalNbrOfPackets() const
00290 {
00291    return m_packetCache.size();
00292 }
